name: 3d VR Roller Coaster: Climb-ing Simulator
description:
Let’s take your roller skater and get ready for furious journey with endless fun and exciting rides. Go Real Roller Coaster VR is a free coaster game which gives you a real simulation of funland by wearing cardboard glasses No matter where you are. Just wear clipboard glasses and find yourself in new era of virtual reality where you can explore real crazy rides and grab enough fun.
Real Roller Coaster VR is a free game which allows you to take a wonders ride with new exciting features. So lets take your step into trolley and get ready to roll with real roller coaster vr rush.
Features:
Extreme fun and exciting journey.
Real virtual reality effects.
Explore crazy rides.
Wear cardboard glasses.
